		 <ParameterBinding Name="ListItemId" Location="QueryString(ID)" DefaultValue="0"/>

		 <ParameterBinding Name="ListID" Location="None" DefaultValue="{$ListId:Lists/RFI;}"/>
		 <ParameterBinding Name="dvt_apos" Location="Postback;Connection"/>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:x="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:dsp="http://schemas.microsoft.com/sharepoint/dsp" version="1.0" exclude-result-prefixes="xsl msxsl ddwrt" xmlns:ddwrt="http://schemas.microsoft.com/WebParts/v2/DataView/runtime" xmlns:asp="http://schemas.microsoft.com/ASPNET/20" xmlns:__designer="http://schemas.microsoft.com/WebParts/v2/DataView/designer" xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" xmlns:msxsl="urn:schemas-microsoft-com:xslt" xmlns:SharePoint="Microsoft.SharePoint.WebControls" xmlns:ddwrt2="urn:frontpage:internal">
	<xsl:output method="html" indent="no"/>
	<xsl:decimal-format NaN=""/>
	<xsl:param name="dvt_apos">&apos;</xsl:param>
	<xsl:param name="ManualRefresh"></xsl:param>
	<xsl:variable name="dvt_1_automode">0</xsl:variable>
	<xsl:template match="/" xmlns:x="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:dsp="http://schemas.microsoft.com/sharepoint/dsp" xmlns:asp="http://schemas.microsoft.com/ASPNET/20" xmlns:__designer="http://schemas.microsoft.com/WebParts/v2/DataView/designer" xmlns:SharePoint="Microsoft.SharePoint.WebControls">
		<xsl:choose>
			<xsl:when test="($ManualRefresh = 'True')">
				<table width="100%" border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0">
					<tr>
						<td valign="top">
							<xsl:call-template name="dvt_1"/>
						</td>
						<td width="1%" class="ms-vb" valign="top">
							<img src="/_layouts/images/staticrefresh.gif" id="ManualRefresh" border="0" onclick="javascript: {ddwrt:GenFireServerEvent('__cancel')}" alt="Click here to refresh the dataview."/>
						</td>
					</tr>
				</table>
			</xsl:when>
			<xsl:otherwise>
				<xsl:call-template name="dvt_1"/>
			</xsl:otherwise>
		</xsl:choose>
	</xsl:template>
	
	<xsl:template name="dvt_1">
		<xsl:variable name="dvt_StyleName">ListForm</xsl:variable>
		<xsl:variable name="Rows" select="/dsQueryResponse/Rows/Row"/>
		<div>
			<span id="part1">
				<table border="0" width="100%">
					<xsl:call-template name="dvt_1.body">
						<xsl:with-param name="Rows" select="$Rows"/>
					</xsl:call-template>
				</table>
			</span>
			<SharePoint:AttachmentUpload runat="server" ControlMode="Edit"/>
			<SharePoint:ItemHiddenVersion runat="server" ControlMode="Edit"/>
		</div>
	</xsl:template>
	<xsl:template name="dvt_1.body">
		<xsl:param name="Rows"/>
		<tr>
			<td class="ms-toolbar" nowrap="nowrap">
				<table>
					<tr>
						<td width="99%" class="ms-toolbar" nowrap="nowrap"><IMG SRC="/_layouts/images/blank.gif" width="1" height="18"/></td>
						<td class="ms-toolbar" nowrap="nowrap">
							<SharePoint:SaveButton runat="server" ControlMode="Edit" id="savebutton1"/>
						</td>
						<td class="ms-separator">
							<xsl:text xmlns:ddwrt="http://schemas.microsoft.com/WebParts/v2/DataView/runtime" ddwrt:nbsp-preserve="yes" disable-output-escaping="yes">&amp;nbsp;</xsl:text>
						</td>
						<td class="ms-toolbar" nowrap="nowrap" align="right">
							<SharePoint:GoBackButton runat="server" ControlMode="Edit" id="gobackbutton1"/>
						</td>
					</tr>
				</table>
			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td class="ms-toolbar" nowrap="nowrap">
				<SharePoint:FormToolBar runat="server" ControlMode="Edit"/>
			</td>
		</tr>
		<xsl:for-each select="$Rows">
			<xsl:call-template name="dvt_1.rowedit"/>
		</xsl:for-each>
		<tr>
			<td class="ms-toolbar" nowrap="nowrap">
				<table>
					<tr>
						<td class="ms-descriptiontext" nowrap="nowrap">
							<SharePoint:CreatedModifiedInfo ControlMode="Edit" runat="server"/>
						</td>
						<td width="99%" class="ms-toolbar" nowrap="nowrap"><IMG SRC="/_layouts/images/blank.gif" width="1" height="18"/></td>
						<td class="ms-toolbar" nowrap="nowrap">
							<SharePoint:SaveButton runat="server" ControlMode="Edit" id="savebutton2"/>
						</td>
						<td class="ms-separator">
							<xsl:text xmlns:ddwrt="http://schemas.microsoft.com/WebParts/v2/DataView/runtime" ddwrt:nbsp-preserve="yes" disable-output-escaping="yes">&amp;nbsp;</xsl:text>
						</td>
						<td class="ms-toolbar" nowrap="nowrap" align="right">
							<SharePoint:GoBackButton runat="server" ControlMode="Edit" id="gobackbutton2"/>
						</td>
					</tr>
				</table>
			</td>
		</tr>
	</xsl:template>
	<xsl:template name="dvt_1.rowedit">
		<xsl:param name="Pos" select="position()"/>
		<tr>
			<td>
				<table border="0" cellspacing="0" width="100%">
          
          <tr>
						<td width="190px" valign="top" class="ms-formlabel">
							<H3 class="ms-standardheader">
								<nobr>Status</nobr>
							</H3>
						</td>
						<td width="400px" valign="top" class="ms-formbody">
							<xsl:value-of select="@Status"/>
						</td>
					</tr>
          <tr>
						<td width="190px" valign="top" class="ms-formlabel">
							<H3 class="ms-standardheader">
								<nobr>RFI Tracking</nobr>
							</H3>
						</td>
						<td width="400px" valign="top" class="ms-formbody">
							<xsl:value-of select="@RfiTracking"/>
						</td>
					</tr>
					<tr>
						<td width="190px" valign="top" class="ms-formlabel">
							<H3 class="ms-standardheader">
								<nobr>Title<span class="ms-formvalidation"> *</span>
								</nobr>
							</H3>
						</td>
						<td width="400px" valign="top" class="ms-formbody">
							<xsl:value-of select="@Title" />
						</td>
					</tr>
					<tr>
						<td width="190px" valign="top" class="ms-formlabel">
							<H3 class="ms-standardheader">
								<nobr>Details<span class="ms-formvalidation"> *</span></nobr>
							</H3>
						</td>
						<td width="400px" valign="top" class="ms-formbody">
							<SharePoint:AppendOnlyHistory runat="server" FieldName="Details" ControlMode="Display" />
						</td>
					</tr>
					<tr>
						<td width="190px" valign="top" class="ms-formlabel">
							<H3 class="ms-standardheader">
								<nobr>Priority<span class="ms-formvalidation"> *</span>
								</nobr>
							</H3>
						</td>
						<td width="400px" valign="top" class="ms-formbody">
							<xsl:value-of select="@Priority" />
							
						</td>
					</tr>
					<tr>
						<td width="190px" valign="top" class="ms-formlabel">
							<H3 class="ms-standardheader">
								<nobr>Date Opened</nobr>
							</H3>
						</td>
						<td width="400px" valign="top" class="ms-formbody">
							<xsl:value-of select="ddwrt:FormatDate(string(@DateOpened) ,1033 ,5)" />
							
						</td>
					</tr>
					<tr>
						<td width="190px" valign="top" class="ms-formlabel">
							<H3 class="ms-standardheader">
								<nobr>LTIOV</nobr>
							</H3>
						</td>
						<td width="400px" valign="top" class="ms-formbody">
							<xsl:value-of select="ddwrt:FormatDate(string(@LTIOV) ,1033 ,5)" />
							
						</td>
					</tr>
					<tr>
						<td width="190px" valign="top" class="ms-formlabel">
							<H3 class="ms-standardheader">
								<nobr>POC<span class="ms-formvalidation"> *</span>
								</nobr>
							</H3>
						</td>
						<td width="400px" valign="top" class="ms-formbody">
							<xsl:value-of select="@POC" disable-output-escaping="yes" />
							
						</td>
					</tr>
					<tr>
						<td width="190px" valign="top" class="ms-formlabel">
							<H3 class="ms-standardheader">
								<nobr>POC Phone<span class="ms-formvalidation"> *</span>
								</nobr>
							</H3>
						</td>
						<td width="400px" valign="top" class="ms-formbody">
							<xsl:value-of select="@POCPhone" />
						</td>
					</tr>
					<tr>
						<td width="190px" valign="top" class="ms-formlabel">
							<H3 class="ms-standardheader">
								<nobr>POC Organization<span class="ms-formvalidation"> *</span></nobr>
							</H3>
						</td>
						<td width="400px" valign="top" class="ms-formbody">
							<xsl:value-of select="@POCOrganization" />
						</td>
					</tr>
					<tr>
						<td width="190px" valign="top" class="ms-formlabel">
							<H3 class="ms-standardheader">
								<nobr>Collection Requirement<span class="ms-formvalidation"> *</span></nobr>
							</H3>
						</td>
						<td width="400px" valign="top" class="ms-formbody">
							<SharePoint:FormField runat="server" id="ff11{$Pos}" ControlMode="Edit" FieldName="CollectionRequirement" __designer:bind="{ddwrt:DataBind('u',concat('ff11',$Pos),'Value','ValueChanged','ID',ddwrt:EscapeDelims(string(@ID)),'@CollectionRequirement')}"/>
							<SharePoint:FieldDescription runat="server" id="ff11description{$Pos}" FieldName="CollectionRequirement" ControlMode="Edit"/>
						</td>
					</tr>
					<tr>
						<td width="190px" valign="top" class="ms-formlabel">
							<H3 class="ms-standardheader">
								<nobr>Recommended OPR<span class="ms-formvalidation"> *</span></nobr>
							</H3>
						</td>
						<td width="400px" valign="top" class="ms-formbody">
							<SharePoint:FormField runat="server" id="ff10{$Pos}" ControlMode="Edit" FieldName="RecommendedOPR" __designer:bind="{ddwrt:DataBind('u',concat('ff10',$Pos),'Value','ValueChanged','ID',ddwrt:EscapeDelims(string(@ID)),'@RecommendedOPR')}"/>
							<SharePoint:FieldDescription runat="server" id="ff10description{$Pos}" FieldName="RecommendedOPR" ControlMode="Edit"/>
						</td>
					</tr>
					<tr>
						<td width="190px" valign="top" class="ms-formlabel">
							<H3 class="ms-standardheader">
								<nobr>Respondent</nobr>
							</H3>
						</td>
						<td width="400px" valign="top" class="ms-formbody">
							<SharePoint:FormField runat="server" id="ff15{$Pos}" ControlMode="Edit" FieldName="Respondent" __designer:bind="{ddwrt:DataBind('u',concat('ff15',$Pos),'Value','ValueChanged','ID',ddwrt:EscapeDelims(string(@ID)),'@Respondent')}"/>
							<SharePoint:FieldDescription runat="server" id="ff15description{$Pos}" FieldName="Respondent" ControlMode="Edit"/>
						</td>
					</tr>
					<tr>
						<td width="190px" valign="top" class="ms-formlabel">
							<H3 class="ms-standardheader">
								<nobr>Respondent Phone</nobr>
							</H3>
						</td>
						<td width="400px" valign="top" class="ms-formbody">
							<SharePoint:FormField runat="server" id="ff16{$Pos}" ControlMode="Edit" FieldName="RespondentPhone" __designer:bind="{ddwrt:DataBind('u',concat('ff16',$Pos),'Value','ValueChanged','ID',ddwrt:EscapeDelims(string(@ID)),'@RespondentPhone')}"/>
							<SharePoint:FieldDescription runat="server" id="ff16description{$Pos}" FieldName="RespondentPhone" ControlMode="Edit"/>
						</td>
					</tr>
        
					<tr>
						<td width="190px" valign="top" class="ms-formlabel">
							<H3 class="ms-standardheader">
								<nobr>Response</nobr>
							</H3>
						</td>
						<td width="400px" valign="top" class="ms-formbody">
							<SharePoint:FormField runat="server" id="ff13{$Pos}" ControlMode="Edit" FieldName="Response" __designer:bind="{ddwrt:DataBind('u',concat('ff13',$Pos),'Value','ValueChanged','ID',ddwrt:EscapeDelims(string(@ID)),'@Response')}"/>
							<SharePoint:AppendOnlyHistory runat="server" FieldName="Response" ControlMode="Display" />
							<SharePoint:FieldDescription runat="server" id="ff13description{$Pos}" FieldName="Response" ControlMode="Edit"/>
						</td>
					</tr>
          <tr>
						<td width="190px" valign="top" class="ms-formlabel">
							<H3 class="ms-standardheader">
								<nobr>Date Closed</nobr>
							</H3>
						</td>
						<td width="400px" valign="top" class="ms-formbody">
							<SharePoint:FormField runat="server" id="ff14{$Pos}" ControlMode="Edit" FieldName="DateClosed" __designer:bind="{ddwrt:DataBind('u',concat('ff14',$Pos),'Value','ValueChanged','ID',ddwrt:EscapeDelims(string(@ID)),'@DateClosed')}"/>
							<SharePoint:FieldDescription runat="server" id="ff14description{$Pos}" FieldName="DateClosed" ControlMode="Edit"/>
						</td>
					</tr>

					<tr id="idAttachmentsRow">
						<td nowrap="true" valign="top" class="ms-formlabel" width="20%">
							<SharePoint:FieldLabel ControlMode="Edit" FieldName="Attachments" runat="server"/>
						</td>
						<td valign="top" class="ms-formbody" width="80%">
							<SharePoint:FormField runat="server" id="AttachmentsField" ControlMode="Edit" FieldName="Attachments" __designer:bind="{ddwrt:DataBind('u','AttachmentsField','Value','ValueChanged','ID',ddwrt:EscapeDelims(string(@ID)),'@Attachments')}"/>
							<script>
          var elm = document.getElementById(&quot;idAttachmentsTable&quot;);
          if (elm == null || elm.rows.length == 0)
          document.getElementById(&quot;idAttachmentsRow&quot;).style.display=&apos;none&apos;;
        </script>
						</td>
					</tr>
					<xsl:if test="$dvt_1_automode = '1'" ddwrt:cf_ignore="1">
						<tr>
							<td colspan="99" class="ms-vb">
								<span ddwrt:amkeyfield="ID" ddwrt:amkeyvalue="ddwrt:EscapeDelims(string(@ID))" ddwrt:ammode="view"></span>
							</td>
						</tr>
					</xsl:if>
				</table>
			</td>
		</tr>
	</xsl:template>
</xsl:stylesheet>	</property>
        <property name="EnableOriginalValue" type="bool">False</property>

        <property name="FireInitialRow" type="bool">True</property>
        <property name="ManualRefresh" type="bool">False</property>

        <property name="ListId" type="System.Guid, mscorlib, Version=2.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b77a5c561934e089">$ListId:Lists/RFI;</property>
        <property name="UseSQLDataSourcePaging" type="bool">True</property>
        <property name="AllowMinimize" type="bool">True</property>
        <property name="TitleUrl" type="string" />
        <property name="CatalogIconImageUrl" type="string" />
        <property name="CacheXslTimeOut" type="int">86400</property>
        <property name="DisplayName" type="string">Request For Information</property>
        <property name="PageType" type="Microsoft.SharePoint.PAGETYPE, Microsoft.SharePoint, Version=14.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=71e9bce111e9429c">PAGE_EDITFORM</property>
        <property name="Width" type="string" />
        <property name="ExportMode" type="exportmode">All</property>
        <property name="Direction" type="direction">NotSet</property>
        <property name="ViewContentTypeId" type="string" />

      </properties>
    </data>
  </webPart>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:x="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:dsp="http://schemas.microsoft.com/sharepoint/dsp" version="1.0" exclude-result-prefixes="xsl msxsl ddwrt" xmlns:ddwrt="http://schemas.microsoft.com/WebParts/v2/DataView/runtime" xmlns:asp="http://schemas.microsoft.com/ASPNET/20" xmlns:__designer="http://schemas.microsoft.com/WebParts/v2/DataView/designer" xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" xmlns:msxsl="urn:schemas-microsoft-com:xslt" xmlns:SharePoint="Microsoft.SharePoint.WebControls" xmlns:ddwrt2="urn:frontpage:internal">

	<xsl:template name="dvt_1">

	<xsl:template name="dvt_1.body">

						<td class="ms-toolbar" nowrap="nowrap">
							<SharePoint:SaveButton runat="server" ControlMode="Edit" id="savebutton1"/>
						</td>
						<td class="ms-separator">&#160;</td>
						<td class="ms-toolbar" nowrap="nowrap" align="right">
							<SharePoint:GoBackButton runat="server" ControlMode="Edit" id="gobackbutton1"/>
						</td>
					</tr>
				</table>
			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td class="ms-toolbar" nowrap="nowrap">
				<SharePoint:FormToolBar runat="server" ControlMode="Edit"/>
			</td>
		</tr>
		<xsl:for-each select="$Rows">

		</xsl:for-each>

				<table>

						<td class="ms-descriptiontext" nowrap="nowrap">
							<SharePoint:CreatedModifiedInfo ControlMode="Edit" runat="server"/>
						</td>
						<td width="99%" class="ms-toolbar" nowrap="nowrap"><IMG SRC="/_layouts/images/blank.gif" width="1" height="18"/></td>
						<td class="ms-toolbar" nowrap="nowrap">

							<SharePoint:GoBackButton runat="server" ControlMode="Edit" id="gobackbutton2"/>
						</td>
					</tr>
				</table>
			</td>
		</tr>
	</xsl:template>

						</td>
						<td width="99%" class="ms-toolbar" nowrap="nowrap"><IMG SRC="/_layouts/images/blank.gif" width="1" height="18"/></td>
						<td class="ms-toolbar" nowrap="nowrap">
							<SharePoint:SaveButton runat="server" ControlMode="Edit" id="savebutton2"/>
						</td>
						<td class="ms-separator">&#160;</td>
						<td class="ms-toolbar" nowrap="nowrap" align="right">
							<SharePoint:GoBackButton runat="server" ControlMode="Edit" id="gobackbutton2"/>
						</td>
					</tr>
				</table>
			</td>
		</tr>
	</xsl:template>
	<xsl:template name="dvt_1.rowedit">
		<xsl:param name="Pos" select="position()"/>
		<tr>
			<td>
				<table border="0" cellspacing="0" width="100%">
					<tr>
						<td width="190px" valign="top" class="ms-formlabel">
							<H3 class="ms-standardheader">
								<nobr>Status</nobr>
							</H3>
						</td>
						<td width="400px" valign="top" class="ms-formbody">
							<xsl:value-of select="@Status"/>
						</td>
					</tr>
          <tr>
						<td width="190px" valign="top" class="ms-formlabel">
							<H3 class="ms-standardheader">
								<nobr>RFI Tracking</nobr>
							</H3>
						</td>
						<td width="400px" valign="top" class="ms-formbody">
							<xsl:value-of select="@RfiTracking"/>
						</td>
					</tr>
					<tr>
						<td width="190px" valign="top" class="ms-formlabel">
							<H3 class="ms-standardheader">
								<nobr>Title<span class="ms-formvalidation"> *</span>
								</nobr>
							</H3>
						</td>
						<td width="400px" valign="top" class="ms-formbody">
							<xsl:value-of select="@Title" />
						</td>
					</tr>
					<tr>
						<td width="190px" valign="top" class="ms-formlabel">
							<H3 class="ms-standardheader">
								<nobr>Details<span class="ms-formvalidation"> *</span></nobr>
							</H3>
						</td>
						<td width="400px" valign="top" class="ms-formbody">
							<SharePoint:AppendOnlyHistory runat="server" FieldName="Details" ControlMode="Display" />
						</td>
					</tr>
					<tr>
						<td width="190px" valign="top" class="ms-formlabel">
							<H3 class="ms-standardheader">
								<nobr>Priority<span class="ms-formvalidation"> *</span>
								</nobr>
							</H3>
						</td>
						<td width="400px" valign="top" class="ms-formbody">
							<xsl:value-of select="@Priority" />
							
						</td>
					</tr>
					<tr>
						<td width="190px" valign="top" class="ms-formlabel">
							<H3 class="ms-standardheader">
								<nobr>Date Opened</nobr>
							</H3>
						</td>
						<td width="400px" valign="top" class="ms-formbody">
							<xsl:value-of select="ddwrt:FormatDate(string(@DateOpened) ,1033 ,5)" />
							
						</td>
					</tr>
					<tr>
						<td width="190px" valign="top" class="ms-formlabel">
							<H3 class="ms-standardheader">
								<nobr>LTIOV</nobr>
							</H3>
						</td>
						<td width="400px" valign="top" class="ms-formbody">
							<xsl:value-of select="ddwrt:FormatDate(string(@LTIOV) ,1033 ,5)" />
							
						</td>
					</tr>
					<tr>
						<td width="190px" valign="top" class="ms-formlabel">
							<H3 class="ms-standardheader">
								<nobr>POC<span class="ms-formvalidation"> *</span>
								</nobr>
							</H3>
						</td>
						<td width="400px" valign="top" class="ms-formbody">
							<xsl:value-of select="@POC" disable-output-escaping="yes" />
							
						</td>
					</tr>
					<tr>
						<td width="190px" valign="top" class="ms-formlabel">
							<H3 class="ms-standardheader">
								<nobr>POC Phone<span class="ms-formvalidation"> *</span>
								</nobr>
							</H3>
						</td>
						<td width="400px" valign="top" class="ms-formbody">
							<xsl:value-of select="@POCPhone" />&#160;
						</td>
					</tr>
					<tr>
						<td width="190px" valign="top" class="ms-formlabel">
							<H3 class="ms-standardheader">
								<nobr>POC Organization<span class="ms-formvalidation"> *</span></nobr>
							</H3>
						</td>
						<td width="400px" valign="top" class="ms-formbody">
							<xsl:value-of select="@POCOrganization" />&#160;
						</td>
					</tr>
					<tr>
						<td width="190px" valign="top" class="ms-formlabel">
							<H3 class="ms-standardheader">
								<nobr>Collection Requirement<span class="ms-formvalidation"> *</span></nobr>
							</H3>
						</td>
						<td width="400px" valign="top" class="ms-formbody">
							<xsl:value-of select="@CollectionRequirement" />&#160;
						</td>
					</tr>
					<tr>
						<td width="190px" valign="top" class="ms-formlabel">
							<H3 class="ms-standardheader">
								<nobr>Recommended OPR<span class="ms-formvalidation"> *</span></nobr>
							</H3>
						</td>
						<td width="400px" valign="top" class="ms-formbody">
							<xsl:value-of select="@RecommendedOPR" disable-output-escaping="yes" />&#160;
						</td>
					</tr>
					<tr>
						<td width="190px" valign="top" class="ms-formlabel">
							<H3 class="ms-standardheader">
								<nobr>Respondent</nobr>
							</H3>
						</td>
						<td width="400px" valign="top" class="ms-formbody">
							<xsl:value-of select="@Respondent" disable-output-escaping="yes" />&#160;
						</td>
					</tr>
					<tr>
						<td width="190px" valign="top" class="ms-formlabel">
							<H3 class="ms-standardheader">
								<nobr>Respondent Phone</nobr>
							</H3>
						</td>
						<td width="400px" valign="top" class="ms-formbody">
							<xsl:value-of select="@RespondentPhone" />&#160;
						</td>
					</tr>
					<tr>
						<td width="190px" valign="top" class="ms-formlabel">
							<H3 class="ms-standardheader">
								<nobr>Response</nobr>
							</H3>
						</td>
						<td width="400px" valign="top" class="ms-formbody">
							<SharePoint:AppendOnlyHistory runat="server" FieldName="Response" ControlMode="Display"/>
						</td>
					</tr>
					<tr>
						<td width="190px" valign="top" class="ms-formlabel">
							<H3 class="ms-standardheader">
								<nobr>Date Closed</nobr>
							</H3>
						</td>
						<td width="400px" valign="top" class="ms-formbody">
							<xsl:value-of select="ddwrt:FormatDate(string(@DateClosed) ,1033 ,5)" />
						</td>
					</tr>
					<tr>
						<td width="190px" valign="top" class="ms-formlabel">
							<H3 class="ms-standardheader">
								<nobr>Is Response Sufficient?</nobr>
							</H3>
						</td>
						<td width="400px" valign="top" class="ms-formbody">
							<SharePoint:FormField runat="server" id="ff17{$Pos}" ControlMode="Edit" FieldName="ResponseSufficient" __designer:bind="{ddwrt:DataBind('u',concat('ff17',$Pos),'Value','ValueChanged','ID',ddwrt:EscapeDelims(string(@ID)),'@ResponseSufficient')}"/>
							<SharePoint:FieldDescription runat="server" id="ff17description{$Pos}" FieldName="ResponseSufficient" ControlMode="Edit"/>
						</td>
					</tr>
					<tr>
						<td width="190px" valign="top" class="ms-formlabel">
							<H3 class="ms-standardheader">
								Explanation, if marked as Insufficient
							</H3>
						</td>
						<td width="400px" valign="top" class="ms-formbody">
							<SharePoint:FormField runat="server" id="ff18{$Pos}" ControlMode="Edit" FieldName="InsufficientExplanation" __designer:bind="{ddwrt:DataBind('u',concat('ff18',$Pos),'Value','ValueChanged','ID',ddwrt:EscapeDelims(string(@ID)),'@InsufficientExplanation')}"/>
							<SharePoint:FieldDescription runat="server" id="ff18description{$Pos}" FieldName="InsufficientExplanation" ControlMode="Edit"/>
						</td>
					</tr>


					<tr id="idAttachmentsRow">
						<td nowrap="true" valign="top" class="ms-formlabel" width="20%">
							<SharePoint:FieldLabel ControlMode="Edit" FieldName="Attachments" runat="server"/>
						</td>
						<td valign="top" class="ms-formbody" width="80%">
							<SharePoint:FormField runat="server" id="AttachmentsField" ControlMode="Edit" FieldName="Attachments" __designer:bind="{ddwrt:DataBind('u','AttachmentsField','Value','ValueChanged','ID',ddwrt:EscapeDelims(string(@ID)),'@Attachments')}"/>
							<script>
          var elm = document.getElementById(&quot;idAttachmentsTable&quot;);
          if (elm == null || elm.rows.length == 0)
          document.getElementById(&quot;idAttachmentsRow&quot;).style.display=&apos;none&apos;;
        </script>
						</td>
					</tr>
					<xsl:if test="$dvt_1_automode = '1'" ddwrt:cf_ignore="1">
						<tr>
							<td colspan="99" class="ms-vb">
								<span ddwrt:amkeyfield="ID" ddwrt:amkeyvalue="ddwrt:EscapeDelims(string(@ID))" ddwrt:ammode="view"></span>
							</td>
						</tr>
					</xsl:if>
				</table>
			</td>
		</tr>
	</xsl:template>
</xsl:stylesheet>	</property>
